Scenario:
Imagine that Jenny wrote a poem, but she didn't know how good it was. Jenny approached Karen, who knows a lot about poems, and asked "How was my poem?"
Rating:
Here's how Karen actually felt about Jenny's poem:
2 out of 3 hearts
Question:
If Karen wanted to make Jenny feel good, but not necessarily give informative feedback,

A. Wow, your poetry keeps improving!
B. Your poem was really nice, I enjoyed it!
